item.title: How to do Dynamic Filtering in Golang using only the Database SQL Package like in Django
item.description: Recently I had to do some advanced filtering using the database/sql package found in the Golang standard library. In this article I share how I handled advanced filtering. If you are a beginner in Golang wanting to learn how to improve your understanding of querying the database, this article is for you.
